name: Sheeps vs Sheeps
description:
A zombie virus that effects sheeps have turned all sheeps into zombies.

You have the last non-infected sheeps and you must protect and take care of them by using them as soldier to fight the zombie sheeps.

Breed the sheeps and don't let zombies infect your base

Save the sheep kind with you strategic abilities

Programming,Game Design and Bugs by Faik Ekiciler

Art by Ömer Hasanov (ohasanov)

Music by Tunahan Karatay and Ömer Hasanov (ohasanov)

(There is a boss at 10th wave try to kill him :P)
